basic.description:
A continuation of MUSC 352/3.0, MUSC 355/6.0.
NOTE    Students must submit in writing to the School of Music Office their request to apply for this course by the last day of classes in the Winter Term.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Electroacoustic Composition

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITES    (MUSC 352/3.0 or MUSC 355/6.0 or MUSC 356/6.0) and permission of the School.
